column1: Bayshore Gardens is a neighborhood within the city limits of Tampa
column2: Florida. As of the 2010 census the neighborhood had a population of 1
column3: 760. The ZIP Codes serving the area are 33606 and 33629.

column1: Bayshore Gardens boundaries are Howard Avenue to the northeast
column2: Lee Roy Selmon Expressway to the west
column3: Bay to Bay Boulevard to the south
column4: and Bayshore Boulevard to the southeast.
